author: MindingMomma
content:
Day 2 Creating Pre-Launch Hype so My Startup Reaches 10k Users
**What got done today:**

  
**Content Creation:**

* Finalized my promo video on Canva. I got so excited that I posted on YouTube right away. 
   * I realized that I also need to start considering “catchy titles” and the video’s thumbnail. 
   * My video has written words (no voice-over) so I didn’t put in captions. I hope that’s not a disadvantage. Does anyone know?
* I googled “viral hooks” and created a 7 second reel to be p | Day 4 of Creating Pre-Launch Hype so My Startup Reaches 10k Users
**What got done today:**  


**Content Creation:**

* I was told that yesterday's promo video did not make it clear that the app was not available yet. So I will make it clear in future videos that we launch in the summer. 
* I posted my second reel on Insta/Facebook. This was a short one – about 15 secs. I am happy to report that it was done more smoothly than yesterday.
   * >!Does anyone know whether using audio straight  | Day 7 of Creating Pre-Launch Hype so My Startup Reaches 10k Users
**Content Creation:**

* So my content TANKED. Like no engagement, little views. It was bad. 
* I changed my strategy to use more of the hip "hooks" and upbeat sounds. It went...GREAT. Apparently commercial/informational ads is not the way to go anymore. It's all about catchy/engaging content. I am modifying my content strategy accordingly.
